keystore_tutorial

Class PemCredentialFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • keystore_tutorial.PemCredentialFactory

  • public class PemCredentialFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads PEM files and constructs Certificates and PrivateKeys from them.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.security.cert.Certificate[] generateCertificates(java.nio.file.Path path)
      Reads PEM encoded certificate or certificate bundle from given file and constructs an array of Certificates.
      static java.security.PrivateKey generatePrivateKey(java.nio.file.Path path)
      Reads PEM encoded private key (PKCS#8) from given file and construct PrivateKey.
